src:
Kunjungi Jaksa Agung, Kapolri Idham Azis: Beliau Senior
04 Nov 2019, 17:10 by Andita Rahma, Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta-Kepala Kepolisian RI Jenderal Idham Azis mengunjungi Jaksa Agung ST Burhanuddin di Gedung Kejaksaan Agung, Senin sore, 4 November 2019. Kapolri Idham mengatakan kedatangannya sebagai ajang silaturahmi dan memantapkan koordinasi yang selama ini sudah terjalin.
"Kebetulan beliau (Jaksa Agung ST Burhanuddin) orang baru, senior kami, jadi kamu sebagai yang muda-muda harus datang lah ke senior," kata Idham usai pertemuan.
Idham tiba sekitar pukul 16.20 WIB dan keluar 17.15 WIB. Ia didampingi oleh Kepala Divisi Profesi dan Pengamanan Polri Inspektur Jenderal Listyo Sigit Prabowo, Direktur Tindak Pidana Umum Badan Reserse Kriminal Polri Brigadir Jenderal Nico Afinta, dan Kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Markas Besar Polri Inspektur Jenderal Mohammad Iqbal.
Burhanuddin mengaku tak banyak hal yang dibicarakan dengan Kapolri. Sebab, kerja sama yang selama ini terjalin antara instansinya dengan Polri sudah baik. "Dalam rangka ke depan kami kerja sama lebih bagus lagi. Itu yang utamanya. Jadi tidak banyak yang dibicarakan, tapi kami mensinergikan lagi ke depan," ujar Burhanuddin.
Burhanuddin juga mengatakan selama bersilahturahmi, mereka belum sampai tahap membicarakan kasus. "Belum ada, baru koordinasi. Pasti ada kasus yang akan dibahas nanti," ucap dia.
text:
Visit the Attorney General, National Police Chief Idham Azis: He is Senior
Nov. 04, 2019, 17:10 by Andita Rahma, Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian National Police Chief Gen. Idham Azis visited Attorney General ST Burhanuddin at the Attorney General's Office, Monday afternoon, November 4, 2019. The National Police Chief Idham said his arrival as a forum for hospitality and strengthened the coordination that had been forged.
"Incidentally he (Attorney General ST Burhanuddin) is a new person, our senior, so you as young people should come to seniors," Idham said after the meeting.
Idham arrived at around 16:20 West Indonesia Time and left at 17.15 West Indonesian Time. He was accompanied by the Head of the National Police Professional and Security Division Inspector General Listyo Sigit Prabowo, the Director of General Crimes of the National Police Criminal Investigation Agency Brigadier General Nico Afinta, and the Head of the Public Relations Division at the National Police Headquarters Inspector General Mohammad Iqbal.
Burhanuddin claimed not much was discussed with the National Police Chief. This is because the cooperation that has been established between his institution and the National Police is already good. "In the future we will cooperate even better. That is the main point. So there is not much to talk about, but we synergize again in the future," said Burhanuddin.
Burhanuddin also said that during their meeting, they had not yet reached the stage of discussing a case. "Not yet, only to coordinate. There must be a case that will be discussed later," he said.
